shadow.name: EXHAUSTION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Deliverance, expressing through exhaustion

gift.name: RESOLVE
gift.description: The gift frequency of Deliverance, expressing through resolve

siddhi.name: RESTORATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Deliverance, expressing through restoration

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 40 shadow frequency. The exhaustion you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural resolve. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from exhaustion to resolve.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your heart. Notice the sensation of exhaustion.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 40 consciously for 7 days, the exhaustion pattern will shift toward resolve.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 40 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from exhaustion toward resolve
